message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DB, cs.CL 

This paper is likely to belong to the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) category as it deals with recommendation systems that use unstructured and structured data sources. It also involves learning user and item representations for recommendation, which is a common theme in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) categories. The paper also mentions the challenge of integrating large-scale structured data, which is a problem commonly addressed in the database (cs.DB) category. Finally, the proposed soft matching algorithm for generating personalized explanations involves natural language processing (NLP), which is a subfield of computational linguistics (cs.CL).
